DOC.brief_summary: Cerebral oxygenation monitor use near infrared spectroscopy . Different device available assess cerebral oxygenation noninvasively . Beach chair position assume influence cerebral oxygenation . Litte known influence prone position head position cerebral oxygenation . The investigator hypothesize position influence cerebral oxygenation . Further investigator presume two cerebral oximeter INVOS ForeSight provide comparable oxygenation data .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison INVOS FORE SIGHT Cerebral Oximeter
DOC.criteria: age > 18 < 80 year write informed consent cerebrovascular disease coronary heart disease severe organ failure hemoglobin < 10mg/dl injury forehead pregnancy
